org.atmosphere.cpr

Interface BroadcasterLifeCyclePolicyListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcasterLifeCyclePolicyListenerAdapter

    public interface BroadcasterLifeCyclePolicyListener
    Simple listener to be used to track BroadcasterLifeCyclePolicy events.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDestroy()
      Both Broadcaster.releaseExternalResources() and Broadcaster.destroy() are about to be invoked.
      void onEmpty()
      Invoked when a Broadcaster's list of AtmosphereResource becomes empty, eg.
      void onIdle()
      Invoke when a Broadcaster has no activity.

    • Method Detail

      • onEmpty

        void onEmpty()
        Invoked when a Broadcaster's list of AtmosphereResource becomes empty, eg. the broadcaster has no longer resources associated with it.

      • onIdle

        void onIdle()
        Invoke when a Broadcaster has no activity.

      • onDestroy

        void onDestroy()
        Both Broadcaster.releaseExternalResources() and Broadcaster.destroy() are about to be invoked.
